Headline: 81 Lawrence Temporary Westbound Reroute near Lawrence/Avondale
ShortDescription: 81 Lawrence buses are temporarily rerouted via Lawrence,Cicero,Montrose,Milwaukee,Jefferson Park Terminal due to, street blockage near Lawrence/Avondale.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Westbound #81 Lawrence buses are temporarily rerouted via Lawrence,Cicero,Montrose,Milwaukee,Jefferson Park Terminal due to, street blockage near Lawrence/Avondale.

Eastbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.
